module.name: product_view_definition
module.name.french: Définition de la vue du produit

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of characterization views of a product version.
This edition incorporates modifications to the previous edition listed below.
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations have been changed:
Modifications made to the mapping specification of the following entity definitions (changed):

inscope.li: characterization of a version of a product, suitable for one or more application domains and one or more life-cycle stages;
identification of a universe of discourse suitable for the description of products.

uof.name: Product_View_Definition
uof.description: The Product_View_Definition UoF specifies the data types needed to represent the data that characterize a definition of a version of product.
